headline: Wesco Announces the Appointment of Daniel Castillo to Executive Vice President and General Manager of Electrical and Electronic Solutions
summary: Wesco International (NYSE: WCC), a leading provider of business-to-business distribution, logistics services and supply chain solutions, announced today that effective September 1, 2025, Daniel "Danny" Castillo will assume leadership of its Electrical and Electronic Solutions (EES) strategic business unit. Mr. Castillo succeeds Nelson Squires who will be retiring on September 30.

raw.headline: Wesco Announces the Appointment of Daniel Castillo to Executive Vice President and General Manager of Electrical and Electronic Solutions

Mr. Castillo succeeds Nelson Squires who will be retiring on September 30.

headline: Exclusive-Korean Air to announce 100 Boeing jet order amid Trump-Lee summit, sources say
summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -Korean Air is expected to announce an order on Monday for about 100 Boeing airplanes coinciding with the visit of South Korean President Lee Jae Myung to Washington, sources told Reuters.  The order, the largest in the Korean air carrier's history, is expected to include a mix of 787s, 777s and 737 Boeing airplanes, the sources said.  Boeing Commercial Airplanes CEO Stephanie Pope and Korean Air CEO Cho Won-tae were both attending an event of business leaders with the South Korean leader in Washington.

headline: GE Aerospace Deal and Unmanned Aircraft Exposure Might Change the Case for Investing in Kratos (KTOS)
summary: In the past week, Kratos Defense & Security Solutions was highlighted at the ITS World Congress 2025, where Vice President Maynard Factor discussed advancements at the Georgia World Congress Center in Atlanta, alongside news of a propulsion systems partnership with GE Aerospace for unmanned aircraft. This spotlight on Kratos comes as industry observers underscore a surge in demand for the company’s defense technologies, driven by increased defense funding and high-profile collaborations that...
